name: HearingLossICD10CM
title: Hearing Loss (ICD10CM)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains diagnoses or problems that represent that the patient has Hearing Loss regardless of the clinical presentation of the condition),(Data Element Scope: Diagnoses or problems documented in a clinical record.),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC query: Hearing loss and children),(Exclusion Criteria: Other hearing loss: family history, noise on hearing loss, ototoxic)
